attributes.action: Withdraw the Honour of OBE from Jonathan Ross
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following recent distasteful behaviour and complete disrespect for the dignity of others [Andrew Sachs, Georgina Baillie], it should now be considered untenable for Ross to retain the honour of OBE.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
